title: The Hills 12:30 Report  De Blasio finds opening to Washington

sentence: Im here because Brian Kemp is the only candidate in tomorrows primary who has already defeated Stacey Abrams, whether she knows it or not, Pence told rally attendees, referring to Abramss refusal to accept the election results of their gubernatorial election four years ago (The Atlanta Journal-Constitution).
author: Alexis Simendinger
title: The Hills Morning Report  Will GOP primaries offer clues about 2024?
